metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32308 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in uBlock Origin extension before1.41.1 allows remote attackers to run arbitrary code via a spoofed'MessageSender.url' to the browser renderer process.

criterions.comment: ublock-origin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
